extracted_metadata.title: Investing in the Unknown and Unknowable
extracted_metadata.author: Richard Zeckhauser
extracted_metadata.subject: Investment strategies and decision analysis
extracted_metadata.summary: This article explores investment strategies that revolve around uncertainties in the market by employing concepts from decision analysis and game theory. It distills these insights into eight investment maxims that provide guidance for making sound investment decisions in unpredictable scenarios.
